About the Longhorn eReader
Longhorn eReader is a digital product of Longhorn Publishers Limited. This android application is a unique platform that the company has developed to deliver eBooks in various digital formats to the pupils, teachers/ instructors and to the general readership in a much more efficient process. The application has been integrated with a variety of functionalities to ensure the users navigate through the platform easily, access eBooks faster, utilize content pleasantly and obtain a great fulfilment in user experience. The company would like to thank a team of innovators behind it and the great technology partners who ensured development and delivery of this noble product.

About Longhorn Publishers Longhorn Publishers is a leading provider of eLearning solutions, core and non-core learning materials within the East Africa region. Longhorn, through its budding imprint known as Sasa Sema, also endeavours to provide reference books, creative works, biographies, bibles, charts, hymnals and general knowledge books to cater for the unmet needs in this area both as hard copies and in digital formats.

Longhorn Publishers has been in existence as a wholly Kenyan-owned company for the last 21 years and has subsidiaries in Uganda, Tanzania, Rwanda, Zambia, Malawi, South Sudan and Ethiopia. Over this period, Longhorn has grown to become a household visionary publisher of choice, with books that are trusted by teachers and learners across the region.

Longhorn eLearning materials can be downloaded and read from Longhorn eBook Store or on Longhorn eRevision Platform. For more information, visit www.longhornpublishers.com
